titleStmt.title: Sinnelesse sorrow for the dead a comfortable sermon, preached at the funerall of Mr. Iohn Moyle, of Buckwell, in the countie of Kent, Esquire, the sixt of Ianuarie, 1614 / by Thomas Iackson, Batchelor in Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods word, at Wye in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S. for Roger Jackson, and are to be solde at his shop in Fleetstreet neere to the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Magdalene College (University of Cambridge). Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreet neere to the Conduit
